detail_desc: Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a wide, gathered neckline front and back and lace sections over the shoulders.
Straight-style jumper in washed, rib-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
A-line blouse in an airy cotton weave with short raglan sleeves and covered elastication with a small frill trim at the top.
Cropped cardigan in a soft knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed trims.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Sarong in a viscose weave with ties at the top and a small hole to thread the tie through after winding it around the waist. Flounced trim at the hem.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and imitation leather tassel. Length approx. 15 cm.
Shirt in cotton denim with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.

Casual-style joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with decorative seams at the knees. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Straight-cut shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and short sleeves. Unlined.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem.
Short skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, detachable tie belt, wrapover front with a concealed fastening and a patch front pocket with a flap.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder.
Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.

Short top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with gathers at one side and long sleeves. Unlined.
Denim jacket with a pile-lined collar and dropped shoulders. Large chest pockets, flap front pockets, buttoned cuffs and a drawstring at the hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wide raw-edge neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Non-wired thong body in soft microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed ribbed trim under the bust and a lined gusset.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins. Slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, flap front pockets and gathered 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in slub cotton jersey with a yoke in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
Joggers in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Regular waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake zipped front pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in a cotton weave with buttons at the sides and straps with adjustable button fastenings. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (in sizes 0-12M) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short smocked top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and overlocked edges at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Cap in printed cotton jersey with a sweatband inside and concealed elastication at the back.
Top in bleach-patterned sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front.

Tunic in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered seams at the shoulders. Gathered yoke at the back and narrow ties under the bust. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Small frill trim around the neckline and over the shoulders and long sleeves with a smocked seam at the top to create a puff effect at the shoulders. Narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in pleated satin with pin-tucks at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and gently flared skirt. Underskirt with a tulle frill trim to create width in the skirt. Lined.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Patterned scuba trainers with a wide imitation leather strap with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and concealed zip with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets with a taped zip, and elastication at the back of the waist, cuffs and hems. Reinforced back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a square neckline, decorative bow at the front and smocking and a frill trim at the top. Elastication and a small frill trim over the shoulders and short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Imitation suede sandals with wedge heels in imitation cork. Open toes, an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel approx. 10 cm. The sandals are made partly from recycled polyester and recycled polyurethane.
Treggings in soft, stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in a jacquard weave made from a cupro blend with a frilled stand-up collar that has concealed buttons at the back. Long puff sleeves, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs and a concealed zip at the back.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a wide, square neckline, seam under the bust, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves. Elastication with a frill trim around the top and sleeves.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Warm-lined boots in woven fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, patterned soles.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Short jumper in a soft, fine knit with shoulder pads, long, slightly wider sleeves with decorative gathers, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a high waist with concealed elastication, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Three short-sleeved bodysuits with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. One romper suit with short sleeves, short legs and off-centre press-studs down the front and along one leg. Two pairs of trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. One hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem and one pair of scratch mittens with ribbed cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Tights in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is organic.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Premium cotton shirt with a turn-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Waist-high hipster briefs in lace and mesh with a lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Cylindrical sports bag in woven fabric with coated details and a print motif. Zip at the top, two handles that can be joined together with a hook and loop fastening and an adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 24x40 cm.
Faux fur coat with wide notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and long, flared sleeves. Lined.
Ribbed hat in a soft cotton blend with a decorative faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up hem with a small fabric appliqué.
Cropped, sleeveless top in a rib knit with decorative buttons down the front.
Ankle boots with a stretch shaft, square toes and block heels. Jersey linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Sleeveless top in a rib-knit nylon blend.
Straight-cut top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Jersey lining.
V-neck top in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace sections and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
